modName: Nanban do Gusoku - Japanese Southern Barbarian Armor - CBBE Bodyslide
summary: A slightly historical type of Japanese armor is now in Skyrim! Let's see how things turns out when east meet west
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://fc07.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2014/232/0/6/nanban_do_gusoku___japanese_southern_barbarian_arm_by_cavinano-d5xzts7.png[/img][/center]
[size=6]Description
[/size][size=3]This is my first armor mod, so be kind with me if there is any flaws on this armor.

Now this armor is available for both male and female! (Big thanks to kofman77 !!!!)

[center]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/center]

[/size][size=6]Historical background (not lore but real history)[/size]
[size=3]Nanban Do Gusoku, or Southern Barbarian Armor, is a kind of armor appeared during the Azuchi-Momoyama Period in Japan. The armor is modified version of the imported Western armor, after adding the tassets and sleeves. The iron curiass can withstand matchlock balls of the time.

[center]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/center]

[/size][size=6]Getting it in game
[/size][size=3]You can find the armor in a chest the Sky Heaven Temple (new feature thanks to kofman77).[/size]

[center]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/center]

[size=6]Requirement
[/size][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]Bodyslide2[/url] is required to create female/female skimpy version 
A TBBP compatible skeleton when using the skimpy version
[/size]
[center]~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/center]

[size=6]Credits
[/size][size=3]A lot of thanks to speedynl for solving my problems during WIP stage, big thanks to Prime and CaBaL120 for the texture and finally I must thank kofman77 for creating the female(and skimpy XD) version of the armor.

P.S. kofman77 also wants me to thank Chrono for letting him to use the skimpy mesh.[/size]



[center][size=30pt]Got featured on a Japanese mod site![/size][/center]
[center][size=30pt]Thank you very much!!![/size][/center]
[url=http://dragonporn.ldblog.jp/archives/6979913.html?1363328664#errors][center][img]http://fc09.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2013/073/1/4/nanban_do_gusoku___japanese_site_ft__by_cavinano-d5y2w75.png[/img][/center][/url]

Change log:
14/03/2013: initial release
21/08.2014: added female and female skimpy version(bodyslide is required)
